title: HSK 1
subtitle: Beginner
description: Essential vocabulary for absolute beginners. Covers greetings, numbers, family, and basic everyday words.

title: HSK 2
subtitle: Elementary
description: Expands on HSK 1 with vocabulary for simple conversations about daily life, time, and activities.

title: HSK 3
subtitle: Pre-Intermediate
description: Covers topics like work, travel, and health. Enables communication in a broad range of everyday situations.

title: HSK 4
subtitle: Intermediate
description: Advanced everyday vocabulary covering abstract concepts, opinions, and a wide range of topics.

title: HSK 5
subtitle: Upper-Intermediate
description: Sophisticated vocabulary for reading newspapers, watching films, and professional communication.

title: HSK 6
subtitle: Advanced
description: Near-native vocabulary for academic, literary, and formal professional contexts.

title: Sentence Starters
subtitle: Speaking Patterns
description: 49 essential sentence patterns and structures for natural, fluent Chinese conversation.
